name: function 14
Graphic Banner
format:
<template>
    <container>
        <v-img 
            :src="this.url"
            lazy-src="/assets/blue.png"
            max-height="500">
        </v-img>
    </container>
</template>

<script>
    export default {

        data() {
            // define variables available component-wide
            // (in <template> and component functions)
            return {
                url: "",
                show: false,
                showx: true
            }
        },
        
        unmounted() {
            // code here when the component is removed from the Dashboard
            // i.e. when the user navigates away from the page
        },
        mounted() {
            this.$socket.on('msg-input:' + this.id, (msg) => {
                if (this.msg.payload){
                    let payload = this.msg.payload
                    this.url = payload.banner_url
                    this.show = payload.show || true
                }
            })
            this.refresh()
        },      
        methods: {
        },
    }
</script>

name: FLUX Get raw MV OCPP
FLUX remove extras
ChartJS Current
format:
<template>
    <canvas ref="chart" />
</template>

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/chart.js"></script>

<script>
    export default {
        mounted() {
            // register a listener for incoming data
            this.$socket.on('msg-input:' + this.id, this.onInput)

            // check with ChartJS has loaded
            let interval = setInterval(() => {
                if (window.Chart) {
                    // clear the check for ChartJS
                    clearInterval(interval);
                    // draw our initial chart
                    this.draw()
                }
            }, 100);
        },
        methods: {
            draw () {
                // get reference to the <canvas /> element
                const ctx = this.$refs.chart
                
                // Render the chart
                const chart = new Chart(ctx, {
                    type: 'line',
                    data: {
                        datasets: [{
                            label: "",  // label for the single line we'll render
                            data: [
                            ],            // start with no data
                            fill: 1
                        }]
                    },
                    options: {
                        animation: false, // don't run the animation for incoming data
                        responsive: true, // ensure we auto-resize the content
                        scales: {
                            x: {
                                type: 'time' // in this example, we're rendering timestamps
                            },
                            y: {
                                stacked: true
                            }
                        },
                        parsing: {
                            xAxisKey: 'time', // the property to render on the x-axis
                            yAxisKey: 'value' // the property to render on the y-axis
                        },
                        plugins: {
                            legend: {
                                position: 'top',
                            },
                            title: {
                                display: true,
                                text: 'EVSE Current (Amps)'
                            }
                        }   
                    },
                });
                // make this available to all elements of the component
                this.chart = chart
            },
            onInput (msg) {
                this.chart.data.datasets = []
                // this.chart.data.datasets[0].data = []
                this.chart.update()
             


                msg.payload.forEach( ( mvItem ) => {
                    let label = `${mvItem.cbId}:P${mvItem.connectorId}`
                    let idx = this.chart.data.datasets.findIndex( (ds) => ds.label == label )

                    if (idx == -1) { 
                        idx = this.chart.data.datasets.push( {label: label, data: [] } ) - 1
                    }
                    
                    this.chart.data.datasets[idx].data.push({time: mvItem._time, value: mvItem._value}) 
                })
                this.chart.update()  
            }    
            
        }
    }

</script>

name: Get Tx MeterStart/Stop
func:
msg = {}

msg.query = `
meterStart = from(bucket: "OCPP")
  |> range(start: -2d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Transaction")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "transactionId" or r["_field"] == "meterStart")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.command == "StartTransaction")
  |> pivot(columnKey: ["_field"], rowKey: ["_time"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.transactionId != 0)
  |> drop(columns: ["_start","_stop","msgFrom","_measurement"])

meterStop = from(bucket: "OCPP")
  |> range(start: -2d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Transaction")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "transactionId" or r["_field"] == "meterStop")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.command == "StopTransaction")
  |> pivot(columnKey: ["_field"], rowKey: ["_time"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.transactionId != 0)
  |> drop(columns: ["_start","_stop","msgFrom","_measurement"])

join(tables: {key1: meterStart, key2: meterStop}, on: ["transactionId"], method: "inner")
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with totalEnergy: r.meterStop - r.meterStart}))
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with difference_seconds: (uint( v: r._time_key2) - uint( v: r._time_key1)) / uint(v: 1000000000) }))

`
return msg;

ChartJS Power
format:
<template>
    <canvas ref="chart" />
</template>

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/chart.js"></script>

<script>
    export default {
        mounted() {
            // register a listener for incoming data
            this.$socket.on('msg-input:' + this.id, this.onInput)

            // check with ChartJS has loaded
            let interval = setInterval(() => {
                if (window.Chart) {
                    // clear the check for ChartJS
                    clearInterval(interval);
                    // draw our initial chart
                    this.draw()
                }
            }, 100);
        },
        methods: {
            draw () {
                // get reference to the <canvas /> element
                const ctx = this.$refs.chart
                
                // Render the chart
                const chart = new Chart(ctx, {
                    type: 'line',
                    data: {
                        datasets: [{
                            label: "",  // label for the single line we'll render
                            data: [
                            ],            // start with no data
                            fill: 1
                        }]
                    },
                    options: {
                        animation: false, // don't run the animation for incoming data
                        responsive: true, // ensure we auto-resize the content
                        scales: {
                            x: {
                                type: 'time' // in this example, we're rendering timestamps
                            },
                            y: {
                                stacked: true
                            }
                        },
                        parsing: {
                            xAxisKey: 'time', // the property to render on the x-axis
                            yAxisKey: 'value' // the property to render on the y-axis
                        },
                        plugins: {
                            legend: {
                                position: 'top',
                            },
                            title: {
                                display: true,
                                text: 'EVSE Power (kW)'
                            }
                        }   
                    },
                });
                // make this available to all elements of the component
                this.chart = chart
            },
            onInput (msg) {
                this.chart.data.datasets = []
                // this.chart.data.datasets[0].data = []
                this.chart.update()
             


                msg.payload.forEach( ( mvItem ) => {
                    let label = `${mvItem.cbId}:P${mvItem.connectorId}`
                    let idx = this.chart.data.datasets.findIndex( (ds) => ds.label == label )

                    if (idx == -1) { 
                        idx = this.chart.data.datasets.push( {label: label, data: [] } ) - 1
                    }
                    
                    this.chart.data.datasets[idx].data.push({time: mvItem._time, value: mvItem._value}) 
                })
                this.chart.update()  
            }    
            
        }
    }

</script>
